name: part_006
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】重大告知あり！紫咲シオンBirthdayアニソンライブ！！✨【#紫咲シオン生誕LIVE2024】 [HOb_TW8uK48]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Murasaki Shion performs 'Silhouette' alongside guest singers.
A short transition with a title card for the next song.
Murasaki Shion performs 'Snow halation' with Hololive members.

subtitles.original: 時計の針は　日々は止まらない
subtitles.english: The hands of the clock, the days don't stop

subtitles.original: 奪って奪っていく
subtitles.english: Stealing away, stealing away

subtitles.original: 流れる時と記憶
subtitles.english: Flowing time and memories

subtitles.original: 遠く遠く遠くなって
subtitles.english: Getting further and further away

subtitles.original: 覚えてないことも　たくさんあっただろう
subtitles.english: There must have been many things I don't remember

subtitles.original: 誰も彼もシルエット　恐れて止まらぬこと
subtitles.english: Everyone's a silhouette, fearing things that won't stop

subtitles.original: 知らないフリをしたんだよ
subtitles.english: I pretended not to know

subtitles.original: なにもない　笑えるさ
subtitles.english: There's nothing, I can laugh about it

subtitles.original: ひらりとひらりと舞ってる　この葉の様に揺れることなく
subtitles.english: Fluttering, fluttering, without swaying like these leaves

subtitles.original: 焦燥もなく過ごしていたいよ
subtitles.english: I want to spend my days without impatience

subtitles.original: 覚えてないことも　たくさんあったけど
subtitles.english: There were many things I didn't remember

subtitles.original: きっとずっと変わらない　ものがあることを
subtitles.english: But I'm sure there's something that will never change

subtitles.original: 教えてくれたあなたは　消える消えるシルエット
subtitles.english: You, who taught me that, are a disappearing silhouette

subtitles.original: 大事にしたいもの持って大人になるんだ
subtitles.english: I'll become an adult holding onto things I want to cherish

subtitles.original: どんな時も離さずに　守り続けよう
subtitles.english: Without ever letting go, I'll keep protecting them

subtitles.original: そしたらいつの日にか　なにもかもを笑えるさ
subtitles.english: Then, one day, I'll be able to laugh at everything

subtitles.original: ひらりとひらりと舞ってる　木の葉が飛んでゆく
subtitles.english: Fluttering, fluttering, the leaves fly away

subtitles.original: 不思議だね　いまの気持ち
subtitles.english: It's strange, the way I feel right now

subtitles.original: 空から降ってきたみたい
subtitles.english: It feels like it fell from the sky

subtitles.original: 特別な季節の色が
subtitles.english: The colors of this special season

subtitles.original: ときめきを見せるよ
subtitles.english: Show me this heart-pounding feeling

subtitles.original: 初めて出会った時から
subtitles.english: Since the first time we met

subtitles.original: 予感に騒ぐ心のメロディ
subtitles.english: The melody in my heart stirs with a premonition

subtitles.original: とめられないとまらない　な・ぜ
subtitles.english: I can't stop it, it won't stop, why?

subtitles.original: 届けて　切なさには
subtitles.english: Deliver it, to this heartache

subtitles.original: 名前をつけようか “Snow halation”
subtitles.english: Shall we give it a name? 'Snow halation'

subtitles.original: 想いが重なるまで
subtitles.english: Until our feelings overlap

subtitles.original: 待てずに悔しいけど好きって純情
subtitles.english: I can't wait, it's frustrating, but 'I love you' is pure

subtitles.original: 微熱の中　ためらってもダメだね
subtitles.english: In this slight fever, it's no use hesitating

subtitles.original: 飛び込む勇気に賛成
subtitles.english: I'm all for the courage to dive in

subtitles.original: まもなく Start!!
subtitles.english: It's starting soon!!

subtitles.original: 音もなく気配もなく
subtitles.english: Soundlessly, without a sign

subtitles.original: 静かに運命は変わる
subtitles.english: Destiny changes quietly

subtitles.original: これからの未来に胸の
subtitles.english: In the future to come, my heart's...

subtitles.original: 鼓動が早くなる
subtitles.english: ...beat speeds up

subtitles.original: 例えば困った時には
subtitles.english: For example, when you're in trouble

subtitles.original: すぐ駆けつけて抱きしめたくて
subtitles.english: I want to rush over and hold you tight

subtitles.original: どこにいてもどこでも Fly high
subtitles.english: Wherever I am, anywhere, Fly high

subtitles.original: 急いで　いつの間にか
subtitles.english: Hurry, before I knew it

subtitles.original: 大きくなりすぎた “True emotion”
subtitles.english: This 'True emotion' has grown too big
